definition: will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: The results will be reported in scientific journals in the near future" , said Dr Vallotton."
sentences.chinese: 不久的將來，其結果將會發表在學術刊物上。

sentences.english: We will not be publishing many clueless user stories about them in the future.
sentences.chinese: 將來我們不再能出版很多《無知用戶的故事》了。

sentences.english: However, we may not be so fortunate in the future, experts warned.
sentences.chinese: 然而，專家警告，將來我們就不會這麼幸運了。

sentences.english: Nice to hear that you will come to Xicheng city this June.
sentences.chinese: 聽說你今年六月將來西城，非常高興。

sentences.english: I believe in the future, Ning will do better.
sentences.chinese: 我相信將來，寧會做得更好。

sentences.english: Week -long national day is coming. I'm looking forword to seeing Yun who was my good classmate at college.
sentences.chinese: 十一長假即將來臨，萬分期待着大學同學贇的到來。

sentences.english: His future was uncertain, but he did not believe it could be unhappier than his past.
sentences.chinese: 他對將來仍一片迷茫，但他相信會比過去過得開心。

sentences.english: What are Cheng Han's plans for the future?
sentences.chinese: 程寒將來的計劃是什麼？

sentences.english: So here's to the impending revolution in biology. Come Darwin's 300th anniversary there will be even more to celebrate.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我們預祝即將來臨的生物學革命。當達爾文誕生

sentences.english: The application of these CRMs are briefly explained and futher studies are pointed out.
sentences.chinese: 對其應用作了介紹，並指出了將來的研究方向。

sentences.english: Do you think goojje will become popular in future?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲谷姐在將來會廣受人們的歡迎嗎？

sentences.english: Spindler hopes we soon won't need to diet at all.
sentences.chinese: Spindler希望在不久的將來，我們不必節食。

sentences.english: We will be able to actually measure the activity of the human brain.
sentences.chinese: 將來，我們還能夠測量人類大腦的活動。

sentences.english: Students in this major prepare to work in factories and other environments.
sentences.chinese: 電子機械技術專業的學生將來在工廠等地方工作。

sentences.english: If you find out that Han Xiaoou is a spy, he is willing to lose his head.
sentences.chinese: 如果將來查出韓曉鷗是特務，他甘願掉腦袋。

sentences.english: The negative in a set of color separations that represents photographically the portions of the copy that will print as black.
sentences.chinese: 中義一組分色片中將來是印黑色部份的那一張陰片。

definition: after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to)/will (cause)/should (enable)/going to
to be capable of/to be able to/can
plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
whatever the case/in any event/no matter what/by all possible means
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
